website_summaries.verdict: A portable repair kit of fair quality, though not for iPhone 7 users.
pros: A 25-piece set with bits that have a good magnetic hold to adhere to the driver and keep screws from falling on the floor
Roll-up bag makes it convenient for travel
cons: Missing Y bit for the iPhone 7
Triangular tool and suction cups fall out of case easily

customer_reviews.title: The tools aren't the greatest, but they did provide me everything I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: The tools aren't the greatest, but they did provide me everything I needed to replace the screen on my motorola phone. You're certainly not buying high end screwdrivers like Wiha. But a single one of those good German tools costs the same as this whole set. The tools roll works well for keeping them all organized. Overall an excellent product for the price. I saved a ton of money using this set to replace my phone screen over sending it somewhere for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: This toolkit has been a saving grace! I've repaired my laptop, my cell phone camera, my point and shoot camera, the remote for the car, and omre recently helped me change the batteries on my calculator! One of the screwdrivers in the set was defective, I contacted the company and they sent me out another one, no questions asked. This thing has more than paid for itself many many times over. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rana

customer_reviews.title: Great for small repairs. A LIGHT DUTY set.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set to repair the Wi-Fi antenna on an iPhone, and a screen on my child’s tablet so far. I have a few more tablets to work on. Yes the tools are not heavy duty. If you’re trying to start a repair business with this set, then you will be disappointed. Buy a more expensive set! But for a few home repairs the set will work just fine. I don’t understand people that spend $12 and expect the durability of a $50 set. You get what you pay for, and this will work FINE for a few light repairs. No heavy prying and stuff like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tears Heal

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to repair my daughter's iPhone 6s after spilled coffee got into the charging port. Fortunately the phone electronics were not damaged but the charging port did not work anymore. These tools gave me everything I needed to take apart and repair the charging port on the phone. The screwdrivers are magnetic so it really helped with the small parts and with the videos available online it was not that long before the phone was back in action! For the price of this kit you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Only useful on rubber screws
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap, decent selection of tools, colorful Cons: Less than halfway through it's first MacBook repair the T5 and 1.2 Star screwdriver was stripped down to a circle. I've stripped screws before, but never before have I had screws destroy the drivers. Would not recommend, made from the softest alloys known to mankind.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Askerman

customer_reviews.title: The Torx number 4 driver is the wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: The most common Torx driver that I need is the Number 4, and IT DOES NOT FIT! I thought this was a good idea, I have fixed 4 phone screens now and I was tired of the crappy tools that were sent with the screens, so I bought this repair tool kit with "Precision" tools. THE TORX NUMBER 4 SCREWDRIVER THEY SENT ME DOES NOT FIT THE SCREWS!!! I have now possibly stripped a screw making it impossible to fix the phone I was working on
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this product for DIY phone repair
customer_reviews.text: Recently my fingerprint sensor stopped working on my Nexus 6P. After contacting square trade, I was informed that I would have to pay $75 deductible to have it repaired. After finding the part on ebay for 6.99 I decided that I would do the repair myself. This kit includes quality tools with magnetic screw drivers that made the repair a breeze. I definitely recommend this product for DIY phone repair.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: The larger Phillips came broken.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well the shaft holds tight in the handles of the screwdrivers but I know that the larger Phillips is not secure And won't even loosen a screw. The handle spins and the metal shaft does not. There's just the basic sizes in the set. If you're looking for a complete set shop elsewhere. The case is nice and holds everything in no particular order. I like the metal pry bar its shiny and smooth. The plastic pry bars are stronger then freebies that come with many phone parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good not great quality set, has case and full assortment
customer_reviews.text: I needed these to disassemble my old phone and it had all the stuff I needed. The quality of the steel in the tools is not super high but for a big set and low price if you are not doing this for a living it will work fine. Plus consider I'm a tool snob and have a SnapOn tool chest with many tools I've collected, so I'm jaded a bit not a typical buyer. No real complaints. For a professional, I'd get better set but it survived my use and was no worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dirkdaddy

customer_reviews.title: The straight tweezers were misaligned by maybe 1/8" and had one tip that came to a needle-like point while the other tip was dull like a worn-down pencil
customer_reviews.text: Both tweezers featured misaligned tips -- the curved tweezers were misaligned by about 1/4". In order to make them usable, I'll have to grind the other tip down to match. The straight tweezers were misaligned by maybe 1/8" and had one tip that came to a needle-like point while the other tip was dull like a worn-down pencil. It'll have to be filed-down also but at least it's functional in its current condition. On the other hand, the blue nylon pry bar is a great tool. I wish this kit would have included two of them. All in all, though, I'm not sure I'd buy the kit again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor quality. Doesn't qualify as a "precision" screwdriver set
customer_reviews.text: Overall poor quality. Doesn't qualify as a "precision" screwdriver set. For example, the Torx number four tool won't come remotely close to fitting a Torx number four screw. The edges of the nylon tools are too thick and soft to effectively pry. These tools couldn't get the job done. Bought an $8 precision screwdriver set from Harbor Freight at much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: zxc

customer_reviews.title: Nice toolkit for phones
customer_reviews.text: Nice toolkit. Just used a couple of the tools to repair a Sony phone. My only complaint is that a couple of the metal pieces that were stamp cut have rough edges. Nothing five minutes with some fine sandpaper couldn't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Materials are what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice, very compact and came with absolutely everything I needed to fix my phone. Phone repair went almost excellent until I pieced everything back together. Both of the Phillips head screw drivers stripped before the screws did. Still managed to get my phone back together decently, but you seriously get what you pay for. The material of the screw drivers aren't that strong, so be careful. At least my screw heads didn't strip, that would have been worse than the screw driver stripping. Those can be replaced easier.
customer_reviews.author: RandallTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well for me
customer_reviews.text: I saw quite a few reviews about how these tools might have problems with the screw drivers in particular, so I was a little wary when I bought this. If anyone else is wondering, I'm another person for whom they worked very well. No problems at all. The tools were magnetized properly and the tool tips didn't bend or deform. I expect I should be able to use it many times just fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap, didn’t even hold up to the first screw
customer_reviews.text: I expected this kit to be cheap and not very durable, but the screw drivers are so soft I stripped the tip of the driver on the first screw of my iPhone X. At first I was worried I stripped the screw and wouldn’t be able to get it out of the phone, but was surprised and relieved to see it was just this cheap tool. I bought a better kit and was able to get the repair done without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kellen Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers bend easily.
customer_reviews.text: The Torx drivers, screw drivers and case "cracking" tools are okay. I have a HUGH problem with the tweezers! "durable stainless steel tip + plastic handle with rubberized grip;Tweezers are anti-static" Okay, they have plastic handles and "might" be anti-static but the tips on these things are TERRIBLE. Bent them on the first thing I used them on when taking apart my phone. They are not durable and doubt they are stainless steel. Both pair, the straight and angle tipped ones bend very easily and although I tried to straighten them back.... they are just worthless. Tool roll in a nice to have and I have no issues with the other tools, only the tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent startup set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the money. The case is handy for keeping everything together and has all the essentials. I first used it on a Samsung Galaxy Note 5 and I cannot complain. I was worried the suction device may not be effective or even work at all but I was actually impressed with how well it worked. My glass was cracked and it was still able to form a tight enough hold to do the job. I'm not sure about how long or how many repairs this kit will hold up for but for the price there's no way you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGurl

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for the small torx drivers I would suggest that you pass on this item. The T 5 torx stripped the first time I tried it with very light pressure. I can't comment on the rest of the tools because I haven't used them. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, just terrible.
customer_reviews.text: these are terrible tools, i tried to use them to get into an apple watch to replace the screen and the “prying” tools are very wide and useless for getting in between the glass and body of the watch, I imagine this would be the case for most smartphones too, overall it’s a very cheap chinese kit with very cheap chinese tools, spend a little more and get something that will actually work
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but very weak metal in drivers - strips quickly
customer_reviews.text: This LOOKS like a good deal and comes with a nice case and lots of tools. BUT... the drivers must be made of "pot metal" the T4 and T6 drivers stripped after only a few uses (updating a Mac mini). Fortunately, I have other Torx driver sets that are actually made of appropriate metal.
customer_reviews.author: LCBrevard

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything has micro small screws in it nowadays. This is the best set for the price, great individual handles for each tool. This set does the bulk of what people are looking for - cell phones, hard drives, widgets. When buying, also think about how small these screws are, You may need to purchase a magnifying setup of some kind to facilitate seeing what screw type they are.
customer_reviews.author: Maxilus

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm.
customer_reviews.text: So it only got a 3 star from me because of all the tools it has in it. I have use this kit for many mobile devices and it works but not as good as others I’ve used in the past. Strength of bit ends are not so good. I stripped two tips working on MacBook Pro which is the main reason for buying this kit. I had multi changer I purchased after and even though it was a smaller cheaper set it didn’t strip out like this kit.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Not high-quality Phillips bits.
customer_reviews.text: Both Phillips had rounded off before I got eight screws out of the phone. Left me hanging with the disassembled phone. I returned the kit and ordered another that will hopefully have stronger metal Phillips bits.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned it very long, but I purchased it to replace the screen in my 2015 MacBook Pro. It has all the tools necessary to complete this. The tools seems to be in the expected quality of the price range. They aren't going to be the best tools ever, but for the price, they're great. The only complaint I have (which isn't a huge deal) is that the spudger tool is very flimsy and wasn't very useful. Luckily, there were other tools included in this set that could do the job of the spudger.
customer_reviews.author: R.Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Cool tools
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a battery replacement for an old tablet and it came with a 'tool' that did not work at all. I ordered this and was amazed at how many tools came in the set. I was able to get the back off the tablet and am back in business. A good set of tech tools that are in a neat little pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Shipp

customer_reviews.title: A really nice set of small drivers and "priers" of all types ...
customer_reviews.text: A really nice set of small drivers and "priers" of all types with very nice roll up case and color insert for each tool in the case. I used to open my garmin gps and the plastic pry bar is made from such weak plastic that curved end snapped off before I'd got Garmin open. Still find this set very useful and much better that the "freeby drivers" included with some batteries
customer_reviews.author: lifeluvr

customer_reviews.title: awesome little kit
customer_reviews.text: it has all the most used tools youd need for most phone repairs and then some. nice roll up carrying case. only downfall, which is not any fault of this product as sold, is the inability to add any tools to the roll. Thats a given as per thats how its designed, but something to keep in mind. Id recommend this to anybody who does some tinkering
customer_reviews.author: Dug T.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set! I just replaced the hard drive and memory in a laptop, and it had all the tools I needed. I especially like the facts that the screwdriver tips are magnetized, which helps control the tiny screws inside a laptop, and that the end of the screwdriver handle spins so that you can hold it stable against your palm while using your fingers to turn the shaft. I did manage to let one screw slip but was able to retrieve it easily with the tweezers. A+!
customer_reviews.author: almare2

customer_reviews.title: Everything needed to repair phones and watches.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the battery in a Google Nexus 6P phone. Repair shop wanted $100 to fix. After watching a couple of how to videos I decided I could this myself. I wanted a tool kit that would be dedicated to watch and phone repairs and this kit was perfect. Everything in the kit was packed neatly in the carry pouch and worked as it should. Made the battery change out easy and now I have the necessary tools to repair the other phones and watches in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good kit by flathead doesn't fit iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to work on my iPhone 6. It's well made and nicely documented as to what is what. I bought this kit over many others because one of the 20 or so screws requires a flathead and this kit has one (the others don't). But guess what? The flat head tip was too fat for the screw. So I might have paid a few bucks extra for nothing... but it's a good quality kit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used the tools much since I bought it but when I did you could see how cheaply they are made. I went to tighten up a screw and it wasn't working, the handle just kept turning not the actual metal part. It's like it wasn't attached to the handle or it came unglued. So it's kind of useless now. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Decent variety of tools to take apart an iphone and other devices with.
customer_reviews.text: Decent variety of tools to take apart an iPhone and other devices with. It had everything I needed to take apart my mac mini and macbook air as well. The little plastic separators seemed a bit more flimsy than the ones that came with an iMac screen I worked on a short while back, but for the price all the tools you get is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Duffie

customer_reviews.title: Best set for the price. Works for MacBook Pro and iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I used it to replace a macbook battery and to disassemble and reassemble an iPhone 6S. The only thing it didn't have was the tool for the hexagon screw that connects the logic board to the body in the iPhone 6S, but I would still give it 5 stars for the price. The smudger and other handy tools are also very useful. My only feedback is that I feel there's a couple tools that are not needed and that the screwdrivers can all use one handle instead of the way they are now.
customer_reviews.author: Laith Zraikat

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, Y driver useless.
customer_reviews.text: All of the tools in the kit were very solid, durable and we'll sized EXCEPT the 0.6 Y driver. It seemed like an afterthought and was much smaller than all the rest. Quite unfortunate since most of the screws in an iPhone need that particular head. Not only that size issue, but the driver doesn't actually fit the screw. It seems to be too pointed and not flat enough to grab the screw head. Therefore I am completely dead in the water with this kit. I tried shaving it down with a file but that didn't help. I will still give this kit plenty of stars because 90% of the kit is very nice and will prove very useful.
customer_reviews.author: B. Calcaterra

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: The torx drivers lasted exactly for one set of computer screws. By the time I got to the second one two of the torx heads were already rounded. Could not believe how cheaply made these are. Then again it's cheap Chinese junk... so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: NHC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: In theory, appears to be a nicely designed portable repair kit. Has many different screw types, pry tools and other phone and electronic repair tools. However, has some serious flaws. Screw drivers are very soft metal and start stripping afternoon first use. Straps used to keep rolled up kit tight and secure are loose and non-adjustable. Also, the strap’s stitching is coming out. Most of the tools have cheap feeling plastic handles but that’s expected for a budget friendly kit. I guess a few of the tools will be of help, but can’t do much with soft tip drivers. Disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I needed a T-4 torx to replace a hard drive a notebook computer. When the set came with T-4 through T-8, two small star bits, a small flat blade screwdriver, two pairs of tweezers and numerous plastic and metal flat bars. Love 'em, love the price. Besides, with a name like "Gangzhibao" they have to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Pandorum

customer_reviews.title: STOP!! Look no where else!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked high and low for this in retail stores and bought similar items with fewer pieces for twice the price only to find out it did not have the tool I needed. I came across this set and ordered it. It’s has more than I need and I couldn’t be happier!! Don’t delay, buy yours today!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: It is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set so that I can pry a watch cover off but I couldn't do it with these tools. The prying tools seem very flimsy, in fact all of the tools seem that way. It doesn't pay for me to send it back to Amazon, since I would have to pay for the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed because I love tools and they looked so great
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about having all of these tools, but they didn't actually help me replace the battery on my phone. The flat edge tools were not thin enough to peel the glass and plastic off of my phone so that I could remove the screws and I had to go on a late night run to but an exacto knife kit to finish the job. I was disappointed because I love tools and they looked so great.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab4 - Got into the back case off.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic, green, double pry end tool worked, after I found a place that would let it in. Got to the swollen battery and removed it, the front panel that had popped out is back down so I ordered a new battery, which they have on Amazon. The batry should be in next week, I'll install it and do a "smoke test".
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of tools! There is such a large variety of tools I should be able to take apart and put anything back together again. Has really comfortable rubber handles too. Even the tweezers are really nice. They are made very well and have a very fine point for picking up small items. This tool set would be good for working on eye glasses as well. I am very happy with my purchase. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Only one flathead screwdriver.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad set for the money. I was just a bit surprised that, out of nine screwdrivers, only one was a flathead. The kit was also missing a couple of pieces. All in all, it's not bad for hobbies and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Black

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few weeks. So far they have been doing good. All the tools I need to open any phone. Very useful set. Just a suction cup screen popper would complete the set. Buy u can get one for few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kutubi

customer_reviews.title: T4 Driver Doesn't Engage Screws, more
customer_reviews.text: A tool I bought this kit primarily for, the T4 driver, does not engage the T4 screws in my Motorola Nexus 6. Attempting the first 7 of 21 screws, only four were successfully extracted. On finding failure of this tool and putting the device back together, the four screws that I did extract were difficult to put in and could not be tightened fully. This particular driver and one more in the set also have a very notchy spin tops which prevent smooth operation. Being one of the most popular kits on Amazon I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT INCLUDE Y SCREWDRIVER AS SHOWN ON FIRST PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this awhile back and just now had the time to fix my broken iPhone 7. The case is really nice and all the tools it came with seem to be okay quality, I'm leaving two stars because I specifically looked for kits that included a 0.6mm Y screwdriver as that is the only one that will work while operating on an iPhone 7, and this kit came with everything but that screwdriver!! It instead came with a flat metal tool that is not pictured. Very disappointed as I wasted $13 on kit and now have to spend more money and wait a few days to get the actual screwdriver I need!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rebecca Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Brittle screwdrivers but other tools are good.
customer_reviews.text: Spudgers and tweezers are quite nice, but the screwdrivers are very brittle and practically useless. The T5 driver sheared apart on the 3rd screw I tried to remove from a cellphone. The metal guitar pick tool was sharp on one side from the stamp-cutting process, but easily sanded-down. The carrying case has a pouch for the guitar picks and suction cup, but there's no flap over it, so they fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: The best tool set
customer_reviews.text: This complete set of tools, comes in a small box, accompanied by a paper where your indications are and what you should have when you open the box we find all the tools we need to make our repairs. If you are looking for a set of tools to repair your cell phones, laptops, tablets among others, do not look any more because this product is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I was so Happy, then....
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was thrilled with my screwdriver set. I loved the canvas organizer. I used it a couple of times to take apart my macbook pro and it worked fine but tonight I tried to remove the clip on a pocket knife and the TORX T6 just fell apart. The tip broke in half. I do not know if mine is just defective, I wish i could get a replacement for the broken T6
customer_reviews.author: Albert T

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice tool set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a collection of small tools to keep handy for unexpected jobs while out and about, and didn't want to pay what I did for the tools I keep in the shop. After a little shopping around, I decided to try this very inexpensive set and was surprised by the quality for the money. Since I got t hem, I have probably used these more than the tools in my shop and I don't have a single complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Phrost-Byte

customer_reviews.title: made with very poor materials
customer_reviews.text: only bought as a $15 add on item to get free delivery, but certainly not worth it. material and tips/bits of the screwdrivers wore and chipped away from first and only use, half of the set has the tips still, only because they weren't used. Even the fine point tweezers bent just from trying to slide it under a screw to lift it out. I only used it on the tiny screws on the back of a laptop and thats it
customer_reviews.author: Kira O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: The variety of tools is nice. The problem is that they are not very ...
customer_reviews.text: The variety of tools is nice. The problem is that they are not very high quality. The torx screwdrivers are larger than the size printed on the handles. The blue nylon spudger is very soft. The same is true for the triangular spreaders which are likely to wear down before actually getting a tight fitting phone open. I gave it 3 stars because the phillips screwdrivers work okay and the roll case seems to be decent quality. Also the tweezers and other tools are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tools at a very reasonable price. Honestly, I was surprised at the quality of the tools and the selection included. It is great for a one-off phone repair but also a fantastic kit to throw in your electronics go-bag or even as the basis for a solid repair kit. For the asking price, it is worth it if you repair just one device. The fact it is good quality will make it so you can work on many other devices, too.
customer_reviews.author: ddTaylor

customer_reviews.title: Bit sizes not heven close!
customer_reviews.text: The spudgers and pry tools are of decent quality and there are a good selection. ALL of the drivers aren't even close in size. If you try too diligently to use these you'll start stripping small screw heads and be in bog trouble! Luckily I had a much higher quality set of Kobalt (Lowes) screwdrivers that had properly sized bits otherwise I would have sent this back. The only valuable parts in this kit are the spudgers!
customer_reviews.author: Wibb

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with a handy roll up case, but I almost mistakenly wrote the seller about missing pieces. The little pry discs are very easy to miss as they are small and very thing and hide in the large pocket they are stored in
customer_reviews.author: patham

customer_reviews.title: Heads rounded out after 4 screws
customer_reviews.text: I had several of the tips of the screwdrivers round out after only 4 to 5 screws. I was using the correct size but the screws were in tight. The remaining tools worked great but the Torx and Phillips heads are extremely soft.
customer_reviews.author: VartLiv

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff. Makes me wonder how it’s so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace Apple Watch battery and to have for general electronics repair. I could not be more happy. Super impressed with the quality of the tools and roll up case.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Bowie

customer_reviews.title: My iPhone 6+ was giving me issues and apparently it ...
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 6+ was giving me issues and apparently it was defected and screen started glitching out and I couldn’t press anything. Saw a video on YouTube on how to fix it but I didn’t have the tools. Bought this and took my iPhone apart and it’s all fixed. Going to do mods on my iPhone now that I have tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ryen

customer_reviews.title: good sizes, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good tools, as described. no complaints. Use it few time already and so far so good. quality is good and doesn't get damaged easily like other cheap tools.
customer_reviews.author: StarGate

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kit, a lot more than I thought it would be even though the pictured depicted it. Appears to be worth every penny. Update 12/04/17: Used it today to replace the power/fingerprint button on my LG G5. These guys covered everything and then some. It is worth every penny! They even included a sim holder opening tool!
customer_reviews.author: mmp1953Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: great kit
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Had no issues with the screw drivers and the items seam nice for the price and rolls up nice. The service by the. Company seams good at first I though I was missing pieces they offered me a new one. I found the prices and didn't have them send the new set. Cons: At first could not find the triangle wedges. They was in a pocket in the corners. This made me thing they was not there are first nice if the was in a baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Love Tools !!!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to replace my iphone SE v1 battery and this was NEEDED. :-) Be VERY careful prying up the old battery!! I broke mine and got my Lungs scorched :-(
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Such a handy tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well-built the tools were. I don't do a ton of laptop/computer repair, so maybe a professional would need something stronger, but for me they were excellent! Inexpensive but not "cheap". And these are the kinds of tools that when you need them there's really nothing that can 'make-do' with. Without them, you aren't getting into your laptop. These did the trick perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: D Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I used these tools to replace my battery in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these tools to replace my battery in my Nexus 6P (screw driver, metal opener and plastic triangle). The set lacks suction cup pliers and a thin metal blade tool. The metal opener tool will cut into your fingers if you use force so ware gloves. Search B015PBX3AM for the suction cup pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price, I can fix a lot of smaller electronics with this kit (to include replacing my phones battery). Only dislike was that the "picks" are a very soft plastic and i ended up destroying all of them opening 1 phone. Other than that, it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screwdrivers strip, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had stripped a screw, then the next one, then another but actually the screwdrivers were stripped! Not good quality; I'm a small female and definitely was not adding that much strength, got 6 screws out of 10 undone, then nothing. Ordering another set from somewhere else and hope they will be better as I'm still without my laptop as I needed to replace the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lively

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic product, would recommend buying!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of my favorite tool sets. I've used it quite a few times already to take apart laptops, phones, etc. it works for each one of them and every tool is a pretty decent quality. This set fits perfectly in my tool bag and I'm sure I'll use it for years to come :) I would 100% recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: so worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying replacement parts that come with their own tools, the heads always broke. these are made of a much better metal and are so much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: C Mast

customer_reviews.title: Drivers stripped after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, purchased based on reviews. I’m an IT engineer but don’t work on phones until my own breaks. I like the roll up. Had 2 drivers strip on iPhone XR disassembly, the 2 green handle, 1 Philip yellow handle. Seems the metal is soft, not great attention paid to selection of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Rudko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tool set for non pro. Was able to open and replace a battery on an iphone 5s and a screen for a ipad mini. It was the best price i could find for a complete set with good review. Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dshin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool set for occasional use. I am sure no one would would want to use it as a professional set such bas in a repair shop. It has saved me money so far and will last along time for me. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great value fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very nice!! Very sturdy looking tools bought them because I shattered my screen protector on my phone well turns out I damaged my screen as well but I found that out using these tools!!
customer_reviews.author: victoria  k

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help me repair my sons tablet screen. This kit had everything I needed and then some. Highly recommended now I cant wait for my boys to crack another screen!
customer_reviews.author: fgonzal

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: There are good products that are made in China, this is not one of them. The screws stripped the screwdriver ... I immediately sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Shalyn Sherriff

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the case it came in. It keeps everything organized already got to use it to fix a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOOL KIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you do even 1 iPhone battery/screen replacement this kit is worth purchasing... all tools necessary for any repair are in this kit!! Tools are very high quality, screwdrivers are magnetized... very attractive and professional grade!! Highly recommended!! I have replaced a 6 plus digitizer, a 4s battery and soon a 4s digitizer... having the right tools for the job is critical, and this kit comes through!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Good screw drivers
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a backup tool kit have not tried all as yet but the screw drivers fit and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Coutou

customer_reviews.title: it appears to be used the rubber is fraying on the metal chisel like tools and one of them appears to be bent ...
customer_reviews.text: received it and while it will be functional and ill keep it, it appears to be used the rubber is fraying on the metal chisel like tools and one of them appears to be bent in a fashion suggesting use, i don't mind used tools but i appreciate being told if it is
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tool kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice precision tool kit. It's perfect for any precision repairs and has everything you need for working on a phone\tablet. Well made case too. I've used this these tools several times without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard124

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Though this product seems well priced and good for quick fixes, it is not! After unscrewing 2 screws from my laptop, the screwdrivers stripped themselves and became unusable. The quality of the metal is so cheap that it cannot withstand any sort of repair and will ruin any attempted repair. Do not buy any of this companies products, they are untrustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Molina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tool set but the pouch leaves a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool set for the price. Loss of 1 star due to the fact that the rollup sleeve to hold the tools does not hold the suction cup or the triangle pieces. There is a pocket you can put them in, but it does not retain them if the sleeve gets turned upside down.
customer_reviews.author: ResqGaming

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool kit. The quality of all the prying tools is outstanding. I have yet to find something I couldn’t pull apart with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Degenerous

customer_reviews.title: Good for a budget but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The tools look pretty good only issue that i had was is that the phones i was working on it didn't always grip the screw right so i had to keep switching to a finer tip
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Holloran

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice that it comes with some many pieces, but don't plan on using it to open Xbox 360 controllers. The T8 will be lucky to get two screws out of each controller and simply strip the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berg

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call this a high quality kit by any stretch, but it does it's job sufficiently. I used it to repair my iPhone a couple of times. If I had to use a kit more frequently I'd look elsewhere for something with a bit higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Great set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought a battery for a cell phone that came with tools. I still used this tools to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to receive it. I opened it and got so disappointed with this. Very cheap material and the only important piece (06 Y) is a joke. Same on you
customer_reviews.author: ZACK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used these for about 30 minutes and the philips head literally chipped off. However the other tools are okay, but if you need the philips, I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson  Friedmann

customer_reviews.title: Torx t4 screwdriver isn't the right shape
customer_reviews.text: The tip of the torx T4 screwdriver in this set is about the right size and has 6 bumps, but it's very imprecisely made to the point that I can't even get it to fit into any of the screws that it should be able to turn. I haven't tried out the other screwdrivers yet, but the tiny ones in general look rather poorly made and I wouldn't bet on them working either.
customer_reviews.author: Some Name 9932

customer_reviews.title: Great value and variety.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool kit. I was a bit hesitant about buying it because you never know what you’re gonna get in this site. But now that I have it, i recommend it to anyone that is looking for a middle of the road tool set that give you the best value.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Essential tools for tech toys repair
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to take apart a smart phone, tablet or ultralight notebook PC (I have Dell XPS13).
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This Kit is Legit
customer_reviews.text: This little kit is awesome, can use the tools and screwdrivers for lots of odds and ends jobs after you're done doing work on your electronic device. Make sure to ground yourself to the mat though, don't want to discharge your static electricity into your pride and joy.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Husband of the Year

customer_reviews.title: One of the tools broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to replace the battery in my Nexus 6. First tool I tried to use broke. Sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bdbull

customer_reviews.title: good 100/100 kit
customer_reviews.text: this kit is awesome , easy to carry and got all tools there, i fix my own phones and devices, so this kit is perfect when i need to change parts like the iphone battery
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL P.

customer_reviews.title: BEST TOOL CASE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We love this tool set. We are a pro so we needed a small setup, something that doesn't take much room in our work bag -- this is perfect. It rolls into a small case but when you open it, you got all the tools that you need for smartphone repair. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SmartCom

customer_reviews.title: 24/7 Backpack tool set
customer_reviews.text: I work as a computer tech at a college. This is great to throw in a backpack and take with me to a desk call. The other tools are amazing to repair laptops with and none of the tools have stripped out yet
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lowther

customer_reviews.title: I just love...
customer_reviews.text: To have tools, lol. This set came in very handy for a recent electronic repair. Great value.😀
customer_reviews.author: Rockhopper

customer_reviews.title: Some worthwhile tools. The quality of the screwdrivers I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Some worthwhile tools. The quality of the screwdrivers I'm not to sure about, The T4 Driver stripped on the last screw on a phone I was working on.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of tools
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set of tools for working on delicate electronics. I used it to install a SSD drive on my notebook PC. It includes everything you will need.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fast accurate shipping and product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product as described works well for the electronics I work on worth the value
customer_reviews.author: NickJames

Opening Pry Tool

Other Tools
